metadata.title: CVE-2023-39327 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in OpenJPEG. Maliciously constructed pictures can causethe program to enter a large loop and continuously print warning messageson the terminal.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-07-12').
insighttoolkit4 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
